ValidationRule.description: UAT Sprint - IWCN 145 - Case Status can not be modified by Lab Manager and Lab Technician profiles
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND( TEXT(Claim_Stage__c) != 'In Lab', ISCHANGED(Status), $Profile.Name = 'Lab Manager' ), AND( TEXT(Claim_Stage__c) != 'In Lab', ISCHANGED(Status), $Profile.Name = 'Lab Technician' ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Case Status can not be modified
